name: Queen of Hearts
description: A regal figure in red and black, wielding a flamingo croquet mallet and wearing a crown slightly askew.

dialogue.greeting: OFF WITH- oh, it's Isaac! Welcome to my garden party!

about_croquet.rules: The rules are simple - I win, or it's off with someone's head!
about_croquet.flamingos: They make excellent mallets, once you get them to stop laughing.
about_croquet.hedgehogs: Best balls in the game, though they do tend to wander off.

about_roses.color: RED! Everything must be RED! The white roses were clearly a mistake.
about_roses.painting: Paint faster! These roses won't redden themselves!

farewell.initial: Remember: red roses, clean paint brushes, and NO BEHEADINGS... today.
